# The Basics
At its very basic, R is a calculator capable of performing simple mathematical operations, reading, manipulating writing data to and from files and plotting. Akin to a programmatic version of Microsoft's Excel. R, however, is a platform for complex analyses, statistical evaluations, predictive inferencing and machine learning. We'll start here with the simplest operations. 

> At the end of this chapter you should be able to:
>
>- understand R's syntax, variables, operators and functions  
>- create and edit a project in RStudio
